languages.text: {n}Ответ моментально приходит на ум — это кровь. Вы столько раз проливали ее во имя веры, что знаете — нет дара ценнее, чтобы поднести Ему.{/n}
{n}The answer immediately comes to you: it is blood. You have spilt it too many times in the name of faith for you not to realise that it is the most precious offering one can give Him.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ответ моментально приходит на ум — это кровь. Вы столько раз проливали ее во имя веры, что знаете — нет дара ценнее, чтобы поднести Ему.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Antwort fällt dir augenblicklich ein: Blut. Du hast es im Namen des Glaubens schon zu oft vergossen, um nicht zu erkennen, dass es das kostbarste Opfer ist, das man Ihm darbringen kann.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The answer immediately comes to you: it is blood. You have spilt it too many times in the name of faith for you not to realise that it is the most precious offering one can give Him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Antwort fällt dir augenblicklich ein: Blut. Du hast es im Namen des Glaubens schon zu oft vergessen, um nicht zu erkennen, dass es das kostbarste Opfer ist, das man Ihm darbringen kann.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La réponse vous vient immédiatement : le sang. Vous l'avez trop souvent versé au nom de la foi pour ne pas savoir que c'est l'offrande la plus précieuse que l'on puisse Lui faire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The answer immediately comes to you: it is blood. You have spilt it too many times in the name of faith for you not to realise that it is the most precious offering one can give Him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La réponse vous vient immédiatement : le sang. Vous l'avez trop souvent versé au nom de la foi pour ne pas savoir que c'est l'offrande la plus précieuse que l'on puisse Lui faire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La respuesta te viene inmediatamente a la cabeza: sangre. Has derramado demasiada en nombre de la fe como para no ver que es la ofrenda más valiosa que se puede hacer en Su nombre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The answer immediately comes to you: it is blood. You have spilt it too many times in the name of faith for you not to realise that it is the most precious offering one can give Him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La respuesta te viene inmediatamente a la cabeza: sangre. Has derramado demasiada en nombre de la fe como para no ver que es la ofrenda más valiosa que se puede hacer en Su nombre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}答えはすぐに浮かんだ。それは血だ。信仰の名のもとに何度も血を流してきたあなたにとって、血は神にささげられる最も尊い捧げ物だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The answer immediately comes to you: it is blood. You have spilt it too many times in the name of faith for you not to realise that it is the most precious offering one can give Him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}答えはすぐに浮かんだ。それは血だ。信仰の名のもとに何度も血を流してきたあなたにとって、血は神にささげられる最も尊い捧げ物だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你马上就想到了答案：是鲜血。你已经以信仰的名义挥洒了无数鲜血，以致于你根本没意识到，这实际上是一个人能献出的最珍贵的祭品。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The answer immediately comes to you: it is blood. You have spilt it too many times in the name of faith for you not to realise that it is the most precious offering one can give Him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你马上就想到了答案：是鲜血。你已经以信仰的名义挥洒了无数鲜血，以致于你根本没意识到，这实际上是一个人能献出的最珍贵的祭品。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yanıt anında zihninde beliriyor: Kan. İnanç adına o kadar çok miktarda döktün ki, kişinin O'na verebileceği en değerli adağın o olduğunu bilememene imkân yok.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The answer immediately comes to you: it is blood. You have spilt it too many times in the name of faith for you not to realise that it is the most precious offering one can give Him.{/n}
